conbody.p: The Diameter protocol is an Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA) protocol designed as a peer-to-peer architecture. Every host implementing the Diameter protocol either acts a client or as a server depending on the network deployment. The term, Diameter node refers to either Diameter client, Diameter server, or Diameter agent.
For more information on Diameter configuration within Nokia Converged Charging (NCC), see the NOKIA Converged Charging (NCC) Diameter Configuration Guide.
